name: Thralls Are Alive - Extra Resources
description:
[h1] Explanation [/h1]
This is a small add on to Thralls are alive and adds extra resources for the Worker Framework. It will not function properly without the base mod. It is there to prove the concept that any Mod can add resources on their own to the thralls are alive mod. Furthermore i make the code of this mod public available. Feel free to add whatever resource node you want. 



[h2] Features [/h2]
- adds Resin as a Worker Node

[h2] For Modders  [/h2]

If you want the thralls to interact with your assets or your assets be part of the working system do the following:

[h3] Idling [/h3]
- add Smart Object Slot

[h3] Training [/h3]
- add Smart Object Slot
- add Tag to your added smart object component:
Taa_Training_Strength (for strength increase)
Taa_Training_Grit
Taa_Training_Vitality
Taa_Training_Agility

[h3] Working [/h3]
- add Smart Object Slot
- add Tag to your added smart object component:
Taa_Working_Special_{templateID}
Taa_Working_Tool_{weaponItemType} (optional)

as an exmaple for adding black ice
Taa_Working_Special_18041
Taa_Working_Tool_Pickaxe

[h2] Ironlight Discord [/h2]
https://discord.gg/mFkC5zj24S

[h2] Donation [/h2]
If you like our mods and have a generous day consider to buy as a coffee. Just keep in mind that donations are not mandatory and not refundable. We do this because we love it, not because of money.
https://ko-fi.com/ironlight

[h2] Github [/h2]
